desc: Locally Owned and Operated. We sell Lawn Mowers, Trimmers, Chainsaws, Ride-on Mowers, Thumpstar Pit Bikes and all your Power Gardening parts and accessories. Our team has over 25 years combined experience and we service what we sell. We stock a wide range of Mowers, Trimmers, Chainsaws from leading brands.

layout.text: We specialise in sales, service and repair of lawn mowers, chainsaws, trimmers, generators, waterblasters and pit bikes!
